pkgmetadata.longdescription: uClibc-ng is a small C library for developing embedded Linux systems. It is much smaller than the GNU C Library, but nearly all applications supported by glibc also work perfectly with uClibc-ng.

use.flag: Explicitly add sym links for libdl.so.0, libm.so.0, and friends for backward compatibility with sys-libs/uclibc-ng-1.0.17 and earlier
